channel.title: RSClassic - A new runescape server for the public!
channel.description:
[b]LINK: [url=http://rsclassic.zapto.org]http://rsclassic.zapto.org[/url][/b]
Hello MoparScape,
I would like to invite everyone from Moparscape to come try out a new RuneScape Classic private server that is open to the public free of charge.
You can create a account in less than 10 seconds and be playing in less than 30 seconds.
If you don't like it, then please let me know what I can improve on.
If you encounter any issues joining, logging in, etc. then please PM me and i will help you.
I just ask that you at least try it out yourself.
This server has custom items, NPCS, and many other features.
We are currently hiring a few ingame moderators, applications will open up within the next week or so.
You can contact me via PM on here if you need any help.
Thank you for taking the time to read about my newest, and latest private server.
Thank you, Desion
[b]LINK: [url=http://rsclassic.zapto.org]http://rsclassic.zapto.org[/url][/b]
